meanings.definition: Covered in or containing a large amount of lime.
meanings.sent1: The limiest soil in the garden is perfect for growing citrus fruits.
meanings.sent2: Her lime green dress was the limiest one at the party.
meanings.sent3: The limiest smoothie I ever tasted had me puckering my lips.
meanings.sent4: The limiest paint color made the room feel fresh and bright.
meanings.sent5: The limiest lemonade was so tangy it made my mouth water.

meanings.definition: Having the most lime content compared to others.
meanings.sent1: This is the limiest drink I've ever had, it's like drinking a lime.
meanings.sent2: The limiest pie at the bake sale sold out quickly.
meanings.sent3: She wore the limiest lipstick, making her lips stand out.
meanings.sent4: The limiest smoothie in the menu was a burst of citrus flavors.
meanings.sent5: The limiest salsa had just the right amount of zing.

meanings.definition: Showing the most characteristics of lime.
meanings.sent1: The limiest scent in the air was from the lime trees in bloom.
meanings.sent2: His limiest joke had everyone laughing uncontrollably.
meanings.sent3: The limiest shirt he owned was a bright lime green.
meanings.sent4: The limiest dish on the menu was a zesty lime chicken.
meanings.sent5: The limiest popsicle was a refreshing lime treat on a hot day.
